DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find a novel method for placing endobronchial blockers without fiberoptic guidance to provide one-lung isolation during anesthesia for thoracic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Two-staged Approach in Positioning Endobronchial Blockers Without Fiberoptic Guidance
DOC.criteria: patients scheduled for lung resection refuse to enroll patients with lesions involving mainstem bronchi patients with anomalies in tracheobronchial tree
